item.title: On Parroting the Soundbites of Anti-Drug Propaganda
item.description: I believe that the drug enthusiast community is becoming increasingly better at striking a behavioral balance between normalizing sustainable (responsible) drug-fueled hedonism and making the idea of harm reduction salient. Most of us have been exposed to biased, moralistic anti-drug propaganda. Some of us (rightfully so) aim to deconstruct such propaganda and invalidate it as a reductionist, uninformed viral idea about a specific drug (“GHB is a date-rape drug.") or a category of substances (“All opioids are morbidly addictive.
